get.description: Retrieve users. Organization admins can only see users from their organization.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search users by name, username, or email
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search users by name, username, or email

schema.title: Response Read Users Api V1 Users  Get

post.description: Create a new user. Organization admins can only create users in their organization.

get.description: Get user by ID. Users can only access users from their organization.

put.description: Update user by ID. Organization admins can only update users from their organization.

delete.description: Delete user by ID. Organization admins can only delete users from their organization.

schema.title: Response Delete User Api V1 Users  User Id  Delete
Response Activate User Api V1 Users  User Id  Activate Post
Response Deactivate User Api V1 Users  User Id  Deactivate Post
